price: Na hapana katika sisi ila anapo mahali pake maalumu.
arabic: وَمَا مِنَّآ إِلَّا لَهُۥ مَقَامٞ مَّعۡلُومٞ
footnotes: Na Malaika kuwania kuwa wao ni waja wa Mwenyezi Mungu, wakasema: Hapana yeyote katika sisi ila ana cheo chake maalumu katika ujuzi, na ibada, na wala hakikiuki hicho.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wamā minnā illā lahu maqāmun maʿlūmun
